content:
I've done a whole bunch of triage and clean-up of our issues. One thing that's become clear is that Jira hasn't been appropriately badgering people every week to address the items that are "Waiting for input" from them. (Either that or everyone's become adept at ignoring those emails?) So I'm going to start badgering here - nothing like a little public shaming :)
To see a list of all of the waiting for input issues, look here: https://jira.hl7.org/issues/?filter=16541
We're currently waiting on the following:

  • @Alexander Zautke - 1
  • @Brian Alper - 2
  • @Bryn Rhodes - 5
  • @Eric Haas - 1
  • @Gino Canessa - 2
  • @Grahame Grieve - 6
  • @John Moehrke - 1
  • @k connor - 1
  • @Michael Donnelly - 1
  • @Oliver Egger - 1
  • @Vadim Peretokin - 1
  • @Vassil Peytchev - 2

PLEASE look at your issues and see what you can do about responding to them (and marking them as 'input provided') as soon as you can so we can proceed to resolving them and applying them.

Thanks!
